document.heading: Anacostia Waterfront Environmental Standards Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-192, the “Anacostia Waterfront Environmental Standards Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-745. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 26, 2012, and July 10, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 09, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-447 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-192 became effective on Oct. 23, 2012.
